name: GuoDongBa Project
tagline: GuoDongBa project is a solution including gym booking for customers and gym order managing for business
body:
### Welcome to GuoDongBa Project
GuoDongBa project is a solution including gym booking for customers and gym order managing for business. Customers can order gym using guodongba anroid application, business can visit our manage site [GuoDong](http://www.guodongs.com), register an account, and then recorde gyms, manage order lists.

### Project Details
In our android app, user can:
 1. Register and login, change profile image, update app.
 2. Choose the hot gyms according to the distance.
 3. Choose the gyms according to the gym types.
 4. Book position of gyms in few days.
 5. Manage orders which are unused, already used and cancelled.

In our [GuoDong site](http://www.guodongs.com), gym manager can:
 1. Register and login, change profile.
 2. Add all kinds of gyms, for example, pingpang hall, badminton hall.
 3. Manage orders.


### Authors and Contributors
This project has Six contributors, we are Yunfeng Wang(@vra), Jianing Zhang(@Hedilict), Chengyun Ye(houtengzhi), Xiaofeng Li(@christina2657), Zhiwei miu(@mzw1996), Tianqi Zheng(@Zhengtq).

### Support or Contact
If you have any question or anything else, please [raise an issue](https://github.com/Guo-Dong-Ba-Team/guodongba-server/issues).
